resources.string: Give Permission to use Camera in order to start scanning

This App may be used in lieu of File Movement Register kept in Govt. Offices. Please note the following points:

 1) The scanner will read only QR barcode.
 2) Place stickers of QR barcode on your file with any natural number from 1 to 50000.
 3) Scan the barcode whenever the file is coming in or going out of your hands.
 4) File number may be written in lower case as the app will capitalize the file number before saving.
 5) The data can be exported in xml format and may be seen in excel if required.
A Simple App to keep track of files going out/coming in the section/desk/office.
1) Print out some QR Barcode stickers (any number from 1 to 2,147,483,647) and paste them on the file.
2) Scan the QR Code using "+" Floating Action Button from anywhere in the app.
3) The first time you scan the QR Code, the app will ask you to add the file. Later, you only need to scan and record the movement.
4) Export Data in xml format and visualise it in Excel as per your convenience.
